repository.description: The URL of the software or dataset in a repository (when the repository is neither a source code repository nor a build artifact repository).

repository-artifact.description: The URL of the software in a build artifact/binary repository.

repository-code.description: The URL of the software or dataset in a source code repository.

title.description: The name of the software or dataset.

url.description: The URL of a landing page/website for the software or dataset.

version.description: The version of the software or dataset.
